name: MarisaLand Legacy
description: Twilight Frontier's latest release is here! A Touhou Project inspired work: "MarisaLand Legacy" Eat mushrooms to increase your height in this easy to control 2D side scrolling action game! But it's not only her height which has changed, the number of players too! Marisa's adventure starts once more...!!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 100 MB available space
